verses.verse: Thus the heavens <S%H8064><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> were finished <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8792><s%>, and all the host of them <S%H6635><s%>.

And on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> ended <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8762><s%> his work <S%H4399><s%> which he had made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; and he rested <S%H7673><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> from all his work <S%H4399><s%> which he had made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, and sanctified <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8762><s%> it: because <S%H3588><s%> that in it he had rested <S%H7673><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from all his work <S%H4399><s%> which 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> <S%H8804><s%> and made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.

These <S%H428><s%> are the generations <S%H8435><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%> and of the earth <S%H776><s%> when they were created <S%H1254><s%> <S%H8736><s%>, in the day <S%H3117><s%> that the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> and the heavens <S%H8064><s%>,

And every plant <S%H7880><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> before <S%H2962><s%> it was in the earth <S%H776><s%>, and every herb <S%H6212><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> before <S%H2962><s%> it grew <S%H6779><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: for <S%H3588><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> had not <S%H3808><s%> caused it to rain <S%H4305><s%> <S%H8689><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>, and there was not <S%H369><s%> a man <S%H120><s%> to till <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the ground <S%H127><s%>.

But there went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a mist <S%H108><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>, and watered <S%H8248><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the whole face <S%H6440><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> formed <S%H3335><s%> <S%H8799><s%> man <S%H120><s%> of the dust <S%H6083><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the ground <S%H127><s%>, and breathed <S%H5301><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into his nostrils <S%H639><s%> the breath <S%H5397><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%>; and man <S%H120><s%> became a living <S%H2416><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> planted <S%H5193><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a garden <S%H1588><s%> eastward <S%H6924><s%> in Eden <S%H5731><s%>; and there <S%H8033><s%> he put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the man <S%H120><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> he had formed <S%H3335><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

And out <S%H4480><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%> made <S%H6779><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> to grow <S%H6779><s%> <S%H8686><s%> every tree <S%H6086><s%> that is pleasant <S%H2530><s%> <S%H8737><s%> to the sight <S%H4758><s%>, and good <S%H2896><s%> for food <S%H3978><s%>; the tree <S%H6086><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%> also in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the garden <S%H1588><s%>, and the tree <S%H6086><s%> of knowledge <S%H1847><s%> of good <S%H2896><s%> and evil <S%H7451><s%>.

And a river <S%H5104><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Eden <S%H5731><s%> to water <S%H8248><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the garden <S%H1588><s%>; and from thence it was parted <S%H6504><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, and became into four <S%H702><s%> heads <S%H7218><s%>.

The name <S%H8034><s%> of the first <S%H259><s%> is Pison <S%H6376><s%>: that <S%H1931><s%> is it which compasseht <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the whole land <S%H776><s%> of Havilah <S%H2341><s%>, where <S%H834><s%> there is gold <S%H2091><s%>;
And the gold <S%H2091><s%> of that <S%H1931><s%> land <S%H776><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%>: there is bdellium <S%H916><s%> and the onyx <S%H7718><s%> stone <S%H68><s%>.

And the name <S%H8034><s%> of the second <S%H8145><s%> river <S%H5104><s%> is Gihon <S%H1521><s%>: the same is it that compasseht <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the whole land <S%H776><s%> of Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%>.

And the name <S%H8034><s%> of the third <S%H7992><s%> river <S%H5104><s%> is Hiddekel <S%H2313><s%>: that is it which goeth toward <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the east <S%H6926><s%> of Ashur <S%H804><s%>. And the fourth <S%H7243><s%> river <S%H5104><s%> is Euphrates <S%H6578><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the man <S%H120><s%>, and put him <S%H3240><s%> <S%H8686><s%> into the garden <S%H1588><s%> of Eden <S%H5731><s%> to dress <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it and to keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the man <S%H120><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Of every tree <S%H6086><s%> of the garden <S%H1588><s%> thou mayest freely <S%H398><s%> <S%H8800><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%>:

But of the tree <S%H6086><s%> of the knowledge <S%H1847><s%> of good <S%H2896><s%> and evil <S%H7451><s%>, thou shalt not eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of it: for in the day <S%H3117><s%> that thou eatest <S%H398><s%> <S%H8800><s%> thereof thou shalt surely <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8800><s%> die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, It is not good <S%H2896><s%> that the man <S%H120><s%> should be <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8800><s%> alone; I will make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him an help meet <S%H5828><s%> for him.

And out of the ground <S%H127><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> formed <S%H3335><s%> <S%H8799><s%> every beast <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>, and every fowl <S%H5775><s%> of the air <S%H8064><s%>; and brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them unto Adam <S%H120><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> what he would call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them: and whatsoever Adam <S%H120><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> every living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%>, that <S%H1931><s%> was the name thereof <S%H8034><s%>.

And Adam <S%H120><s%> gave <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> names <S%H8034><s%> to all cattle <S%H929><s%>, and to the fowl <S%H5775><s%> of the air <S%H8064><s%>, and to every beast <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>; but for Adam <S%H120><s%> there was not found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> an help meet <S%H5828><s%> for him.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> caused <S%H5307><s%> a deep sleep <S%H8639><s%> to fall <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8686><s%> upon Adam <S%H121><s%>, and he slept <S%H3462><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: and he took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of his ribs <S%H6763><s%>, and closed up <S%H5462><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> instead thereof;

And the rib <S%H6763><s%>, which the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> had taken <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from man <S%H120><s%>, made <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> he a woman <S%H802><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> her unto the man <S%H120><s%>.

And Adam <S%H120><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, This <S%H2063><s%> is now <S%H6471><s%> bone <S%H6106><s%> of my bones <S%H6106><s%>, and flesh <S%H1320><s%> of my flesh <S%H1320><s%>: she <S%H2063><s%> shall be called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8735><s%> Woman <S%H802><s%>, because she <S%H2063><s%> was taken <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8795><s%> out of Man <S%H376><s%>.

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> shall a man <S%H376><s%> leave <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> and his mother <S%H517><s%>, and shall cleave <S%H1692><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto his wife <S%H802><s%>: and they shall be one <S%H259><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%>.
And they were both <S%H8147><s%> naked <S%H6174><s%>, the man <S%H120><s%> and his wife <S%H802><s%>, and were not ashamed <S%H954><s%> <S%H8709><s%>.
